data.title: Daniel John Doyle Obituary 2023
data.meta_description: Daniel John Doyle ,52, Departed from his earthly home on May 2, 2023, at Summa Health System-Akron. Born in Akron, Ohio he was raised by his grandparents, He spent his life doin...
data.text:
Daniel John Doyle ,52, Departed from his earthly home on May 2, 2023, at Summa Health System-Akron. Born in Akron, Ohio he was raised by his grandparents, He spent his life doing what he loved the best, trucking. He started driving when he was 18 years old and traveled thousands of miles from coast to coast. He was best known as “Indian” as his handle. He met the love of his life, Trisha, and moved to Amory, Ms where they raised three children together. He loved his children, outdoors, boats, and working on vehicles. As outgoing as he was, he never met a stranger and would start a conversation with anyone. He was surrounded by his family when he departed from us.

Survived by his children Kelly Red (Paul) of Fulton, MS, Nathan Doyle (Amber) of Nettleton, MS, and Ashley Edwards (Lex) of Starkville, MS. Grandchildren include Isaac Doyle, Colby Doyle, Camryn Doyle, Olivia Red, KC Carter, Jailey Carter and Kailey Carter. Sister, Jacqueline Ajanel (Pedro), Arazelia, Azalie, and Azael Ajanel all of New Philadelphia, OH. Numerous family members, Angela (Bill) Proctor of Wagnor, OK, Mary (Mark) Smith of Nashville, Tn, Diana and Bill Doyle of NC. Dearest of friends Misha and Joe Prunesti of Canton, OH. And lastly, his girlfriend Jess of Akron.

Preceded in death by his mother Georgia Doyle and grandparents Mary Stewart LaFon and William Doyle, and an uncle Stephen Doyle.

Private services for family and close friends are May 4 at 2:30pm at Adams Mason Funeral Home in Akron. A celebration of life ceremony will be held in Amory, MS at a later date.
